question: Which Indian state has signed a MoU with the UK India Business Council, to promote business relations between UK and India?
explanation:
The Government of Maharashtraâ€™s industrial infrastructure development agency, Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation (MIDC) has recently signed a MoU with UK India Business Council.
The agreement aims to promote sustainable business relations between UK and India. This will help the state to develop its business environment and promote its partnership with the British business.
